400+ More than 400 for hardware and software ≥10% R&D Investment of over 10%of Turnover ≥50% Over 500 R&D Staffs which is more than 50% of the total Staff About Maxvision Maxvision Technology Corp. is a listed enterprise on the Main Board of Shenzhen Stock Exchange (stock code " 002990" ), with its headquarters in Shenzhen City, Guangdong Province, China. It is also a national high- tech company engaged in the research of artificial intelligence, big data, Internet of Things, and other new- generation information technologies, which provides users with intelligent products and" Al+Industry" solutions in line with future trends, and serves the overall construction of a smart society. The company has a team of hundreds of people working on hardware and software development and artificial intelligence algorithm research, with R& D staff accounting for over 50% of the company's total headcount. The software and hardware products formed for sale amount to more than 400 kinds. The company's annual investmentin research and development accounts for more than 10% of its operating revenue. Solution Overview In response to the high personnel mobility, complex identity profiles, and elevated security demands within seaport operational zones, Maxvision delivers an access management solution built on pre-registration, automated verification, and traceable movement. By integrating advanced identity authentication with real-time behavior analytics, the system enables precise access control, proactive risk detection, and enhanced operational efficiency. Key Features • Multi-factor Authentication: Supports multimodal identity verification to ensure reliable and accurate personnel identification. • Fast and Streamlined Access: Combines advance appointment with on-site intelligent checks to reduce waiting times and accelerate entry. • Intelligent Behavior Monitoring: Continuously analyzes personnel movements to detect anomalies and issue early warnings. • Access Rights Management: Enables flexible permission settings to prevent unauthorized entry into sensitive zones. • Automated Operations: Digitizes the access process to reduce manual intervention and enhance operational efficiency Related products In response to the high personnel mobility, complex identity profiles, and elevated security demands within seaport operational zones, Maxvision delivers an access management solution built on pre-registration, automated verification, and traceable movement. By integrating advanced identity authentication with real-time behavior analytics, the system enables precise access control, proactive risk detection, and enhanced operational efficiency. Smart Seaport Intelligent Traffic Smart Traffic Safety Solution Smart Traffic Flow Solution Smart Traffic Service Solution Smart Port Immigration Passenger Inspection Solution Immigration Vehicle Inspection Solution Customs Passenger Inspection Solution Customs Vehicle Inspection Solution Customs Cargo Inspection Solution Police Checkpoint Inspection Solution Smart Airport Airport Security Checking System Smart Seaport Personnel Access Control Solution Vehicle Access Control Solution Electronic Cargo Tracking Solution Seaport Security Management Solution Smart Campus Personnel Access Control Solution Vehicle Access Control Solution Integrated Campus Security Solution Overview Maxvision Smart Seaport Solution delivers a unified digital management framework designed around four operational pillars: personnel, vehicles, cargo, and port infrastructure. The solution addresses core seaport challenges by integrating identity authentication, traffic coordination, cargo supervision, bonded cargo monitoring, and perimeter security into a cohesive system. This enables ports to break down data silos, enhance operational flow, and strengthen overall risk control. Features Secure Personnel Access Pre-registration and access control ensure only authorized staff enter work zones. Efficient Vehicle Movement Real-time guidance and tracking optimize on-site vehicle flow. In-transit Cargo Monitoring Real-time oversight of route, status, and anomalies. Integrated Seaport Security Zone fencing, drone patrols, and visual command strengthen closed-loop safety. Centralized Operations Management Unified system oversight reduces manual inspection and coordination costs.
